scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && bin/rollup-node && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -g d3-collection:d3,d3-dispatch:d3,d3-dsv:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-request.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-request.js -c -m -o build/d3-request.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-request/build/d3-request.js d3-request.v1.js && cp ../d3-request/build/d3-request.min.js d3-request.v1.min.js && git add d3-request.v1.js d3-request.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-request ${VERSION}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-request.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-request.js build/d3-request.min.js
